### Expression of Interest: Air Filters for the Public Health Agency of Canada

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
**Reference Number:** WS3408726208

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply of air filters.

**Scope of Work:**
A two-year Standing Offer is required to provide air filters on an "as and when" requested basis for the Public Health Agency of Canada in Winnipeg, Manitoba. The offer includes three one-year option periods.

**Delivery Locations:**
The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering air filters to PHAC locations in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

**Trade Agreements:**
This solicitation is subject to the provisions of several free trade agreements, including the Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Closing Date:**
The submission deadline for this solicitation is November 8, 2022, at 14:00 MST.

**Contractor Details:**
A detailed specification package and additional information can be obtained by contacting Linda Chan at [chan.linda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chan.linda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

**Language of Communication:**
English and French

**Tender Status:**
This solicitation is an expired request for a standing offer.

**Attachments:**
None

### Description of Goods and Services
Air filters for the Public Health Agency of Canada are required on an "as and when" requested basis. The successful bidder will be responsible for supplying these goods to PHAC locations in Winnipeg, Manitoba, during the term of the Standing Offer.

### Bid Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit their standing offer bids by November 8, 2022, at 14:00 MST. Late bids will not be accepted.

### Notice of Correction
There has been a correction to the closing time for the bidding process. Bids must be submitted on November 8, 2022, at 14:00 MST. Bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive. Ariba Discovery and Buyandsell posting deadlines are canceled. Bidders must ensure that all supporting documentation and bid submission are submitted on time.

**Contact Information**
Linda Chan, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), [chan.linda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:chan.linda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
